special_abilities.name: Aggressive.
descriptions: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The orc is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The orc has the following cleric spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): guidance, mending, resistance, thaumaturgy
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): guidance, mending, resistance, thaumaturgy

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): bane, cure wounds, guiding bolt
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): bane, cure wounds, guiding bolt
2nd level (3 slots): augury, warding bond

descriptions.raw: 3rd level (2 slots): bestow curse, create food and water
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3rd level (2 slots): bestow curse, create food and water

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The orc makes two claw attacks, or four claw attacks if it has fewer than half of its hit points remaining.

actions.name: Claw.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) slashing damage.
